text:
[Verse]
Morning light shines bright today
Walking down on Main Street's way
Coffee brewing people sway
Start of something new okay

[Verse 2]
Street is waking shops alive
Everyone with smiles they thrive
Simple joys they all arrive
Feeling good to just survive

[Chorus]
Sunrise on Main Street
Dancing in the heartbeat
Sunshine makes you feel sweet
Life's a simple repeat

[Verse 3]
Flowers blooming by the lanes
Children laughing through the trains
No need for the fancy gains
Joy is found in simple aims

[Bridge]
Breath of fresh air fills the town
Happiness in every sound
Main Street keeps you safe and sound
Love is always hanging 'round

[Chorus]
Sunrise on Main Street
Dancing in the heartbeat
Sunshine makes you feel sweet
Life's a simple repeat
title: Sunrise on Main Street
